DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , randomize , double-blind clinical study compare safety efficacy treatment perform Low Intensity Extracorporeal Shockwave Therapy ( LI-ESWT ) device - `` Renova '' symptomatic ED patient safety efficacy control sham patient .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Associated With Treating Erectile Dysfunction Patients With Low Intensity Shockwaves Renova
DOC.criteria: Good general health Vascular ED least 6 month International Index Erectile Function 6 ( IIEFEF ) 11 25 Positive response PDE5I ( able penetrate demand=Responders ) Negative response PDE5I ( unable penetrate demand even maximum PDE5I dosage = Nonresponders ) Stable heterosexual relationship 3 month Hormonal , neurological psychological pathology Past radical prostatectomy extensive pelvic surgery Recovering cancer last 5 year Any unstable medical , psychiatric , spinal cord injury penile anatomical abnormality Clinically significant chronic hematological disease Antiandrogens , oral injectable androgen Past radiotherapy treatment pelvic region International normalize ratio ( INR ) > 3 patient use blood thinner ( Coumadin )
